attributes.action: stop attacking the vulnerable and disabled
attributes.additional_details:
i want you to take into account those that have worked all their working life and has not been a layabout, yet your new reforms for the contribution based employment and support allowance means this benefit will stop after a year and if been on it a year stop immediately!.
   Even if a partner or husband works 16+ hours and you take this away you will be putting some families into even more poverty.  If this reform comes into force mine's will be taken away, i am disabled and mine will pay for carers to come in and look after me, take it away and what then!!.... stop this now and have a good look at how your stupid decisions are affecting those more vulnerable in the community and take it from those more able
